data.title: Captain Ahab Commandeers Ireland !!! by Ahab's Adventures — Kickstarter

data.description: Captain Ahab, a 3ft tall bright yellow wooden fisherman/aspiring wannabe pirate, wants to commandeer Ireland ... join us !!!

data.title: Rotors over Hartsville by Eric Lind — Kickstarter

data.description: A photography project shot over the abandoned Nuclear Plant in Hartsville, Tennessee.

data.title: EMPTY CITY International  |   Photographs by Aaron Hill by Aaron Hill — Kickstarter
data.name: Aaron Hill
data.description: An exhibition of long exposure landscapes that erase all of a city's inhabitants, leaving the viewer to imagine what’s been obscured.
